name: Wikipedia Dark Cyan (like Cyanogenmod)
description:
Tony Stark should use this!
Dark background, light foreground, cyan/blue links.
additional_info:

Changes:
- removed external images
- fixed code block backgrounds
- math images inverted
- navigation box redesign
- citation tooltip background color
- table heading background color
